#### About me

I am a Ph.D. candidate of Economics at the University of the Andes (Bogotá, Colombia). My research focuses on the field of Development Economics and Environmental Economics and Natural Resources. I have a particular interest in the illegal and unreported fishing, and analyzing the effects conservation tools and property rights instruments have on fishing. I holds an M.S. in Economics from University of the Andes, Colombia. Additionally, I have a B.S. in Economics from Universidad de Cartagena, Colombia. Moreover, I have actively participated in congresses such as the EfD annual meeting in 2022. When I am not teaching or conducting research, I enjoys walking and spending quality time with my daughter and wife.

Programming skills: Python, R, Bigquery and Stata.
Languages: Spanish and  English

I will be in the Economics Job Markets in 2024-2025. You can find my CV <a href="https://jorgephd.github.io/jorge-montero.github.io/cv/Cv_JorgeMontero.pdf">here</a>
and my Job Market Paper <a href="https://github.com/JorgePhD/jorge-montero.github.io/blob/main/research/Lockdown_and_Fishing.pdf">here</a>.
